statements: SELECT * FROM production_tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM production_tasks WHERE task_priority > 3;
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration FROM production_tasks WHERE assigned_worker = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline, estimated_duration, assigned_worker FROM production_tasks ORDER BY deadline ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT task_name, task_priority FROM production_tasks WHERE task_priority < 2 ORDER BY task_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM production_tasks WHERE task_priority > 3 ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_name, DATEDIFF(deadline, NOW()) AS days_left FROM production_tasks WHERE assigned_worker = 'Alice' AND deadline > NOW();
SELECT assigned_worker, COUNT(task_id) FROM production_tasks GROUP BY assigned_worker HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 2;
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration FROM production_tasks WHERE task_priority = 1 AND deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM production_tasks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name FROM production_tasks WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_tasks INNER JOIN production_schedule ON production_tasks.task_id = production_schedule.task_id WHERE start_time < end_time;
SELECT * FROM production_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM production_tasks WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM production_schedule WHERE start_time > '08:00:00' AND end_time < '17:00:00';
SELECT p.task_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM production_tasks p, production_schedule s WHERE p.task_id = s.task_id;
SELECT * FROM production_tasks
SELECT task_name, start_time FROM production_tasks
SELECT task_id, task_name, end_time FROM production_tasks ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT task_name, schedule_date FROM production_tasks, production_schedule WHERE production_tasks.task_id = production_schedule.task_id
SELECT task_name, optimization_score FROM production_tasks, optimal_schedule WHERE production_tasks.task_id = optimal_schedule.task_id ORDER BY optimization_score DESC
SELECT * FROM production_tasks WHERE task_id = 1
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_tasks ORDER BY start_time DESC

SELECT pt.task_name, ps.schedule_date, os.optimization_score FROM production_tasks pt JOIN production_schedule ps ON pt.task_id = ps.task_id JOIN optimal_schedule os ON ps.schedule_id = os.schedule_id
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_tasks WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT task_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_schedules FROM production_tasks pt JOIN production_schedule ps ON pt.task_id = ps.task_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING num_schedules > 3
SELECT * FROM ProductionTasks WHERE status = 'Planned';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT machine_name, capacity FROM Machines WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT task_id, machine_id, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, productivity_value, recorded_at FROM ProductivityMetrics ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionTasks WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT machine_name, capacity, status FROM Machines WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY machine_name ASC;

SELECT task_name, machine_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionTasks PT JOIN ProductionSchedule PS ON PT.task_id = PS.task_id JOIN Machines M ON PS.machine_id = M.machine_id WHERE M.status = 'Active' AND PT.status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT task_name, machine_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionTasks PT JOIN ProductionSchedule PS ON PT.task_id = PS.task_id JOIN Machines M ON PS.machine_id = M.machine_id WHERE M.status = 'Inactive' AND PT.status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_name ASC;

SELECT machine_name, AVG(productivity_value) AS avg_productivity FROM Machines M JOIN ProductivityMetrics PM ON M.machine_id = PM.machine_id GROUP BY machine_name HAVING avg_productivity > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_productivity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionTasks;
SELECT task_name, description FROM ProductionTasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, deadline, task_name FROM ProductionTasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, description FROM ProductionTasks WHERE task_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT task_id, AVG(efficiency_percentage) AS avg_efficiency FROM TaskEfficiency GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionTasks;
SELECT task_name, description FROM ProductionTasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE end_time > '2021-12-31';

SELECT ProductionTasks.task_name, TaskDependencies.dependent_task_id FROM ProductionTasks JOIN TaskDependencies ON ProductionTasks.task_id = TaskDependencies.task_id WHERE TaskDependencies.task_id = 1;

SELECT TaskEfficiency.task_id, efficiency_percentage, performance_metric FROM TaskEfficiency JOIN ProductionTasks ON TaskEfficiency.task_id = ProductionTasks.task_id WHERE TaskEfficiency.performance_metric = 'Quality' ORDER BY efficiency_percentage DESC;
